(Same as LING 311 1) FREN 311-001  French Phonetics
Prof. Mendes
MW 11:20am-12:35pm (online)
Content:  Instruction and practice in the correct pronunciation of standard French, including work in transcription using the International Phonetic Alphabet.
Textbook: Sons et sens (2013) by A. Violin-Wigent, J. Miller, and F. Grim. ISBN - 1589010717 Georgetown University Press.
course_description: Instruction and practice in the correct pronunciation of standard French, including work in transcription using the International Phonetic Alphabet.
